data.title: Preferred First Name
data.text:
GGC recognizes that individuals may wish to use a preferred or chosen first name instead of a legal name for a variety of reasons.

In keeping with GGCâ€™s mission to ensure that all community members feel included in a welcoming environment, students and employees may choose to provide an optional preferred first name that will appear in the specific applications listed below.

If provided, the preferred first name will be displayed in the following systems:

Grizzly Den within Banner

MyCourses

Claw Mail / Office 365 / Microsoft Teams

Class Picture Book

Mentee Picture Book

StarRez

Additional applications may be added to this list in the future.

Student and employee legal names will remain unchanged in all other college-related systems. By providing a preferred first name, students and employees understand that a preferred first name may not be used for purposes of misrepresentation, and Georgia Gwinnett College reserves the right to remove a preferred first name that is not in keeping with the intended purpose of this service.

Please note:

Legal names will be required for students enrolled in eCore courses.

Preferred names will not be used in cases where legal name is required, including but not limited to, financial aid documents, official transcripts, diplomas, human resources and payroll records, and federal immigration documents.

Timeline

Preferred first names will be enabled in the specified applications beginning August 3, 2022. Because this is a new offering, some previously entered data may need to be updated. Please follow the preferred name change process to update your information if necessary. If you need assistance, please contact @email.

How to Request a Preferred First Name Change

Students

Check and update preferred student first name via Grizzly Den within Banner.

Once a preferred first name is entered it may take up to 2 business days for the change to be reflected in the applications that support preferred first name.

Employees

Check and update preferred employee first name via OneUSG.

Once a preferred first name is entered it may take up to seven business days for the change to be reflected in the applications that support preferred first name.

Related Information

Legal name changes: If you have legally changed your name, students should visit the Registrar office and employees should visit Human Resources to update your legal name in college systems.
